message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards. It offers unparalleled performance and quality, making it an exceptional investment. Considering its value, I am offering it to you for $2000000. I believe this is a fair price given the benefits it provides. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or if you have any questions.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. I believe it's a bit steep at $2000000, and I'm not sure I can justify the cost. Can we meet in the middle at $1500000?
